| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | [SpliceHack 1.1.0 L2562](https://github.com/NullCGT/SpliceHack/blob/Spl-R-1.1.0/src/monst.c#L2562) |

A **Korrupt Kop**, K, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"). The Korrupt Kop is a type of [Keystone Kop](/wiki/Keystone_Kop_\(monster_class\) "Keystone Kop (monster class)") that has exactly the same statistics as a [Kop Lieutenant](/wiki/Kop_Lieutenant "Kop Lieutenant"), including a matching weapon attack, but can appear in circumstances outside of stealing from [shops](/wiki/Shop "Shop").

## Generation

Korrupt Kops can be randomly generated unlike other Kops.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Korrupt_Kop\&action=edit)*
html:
Korrupt Kop

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
K Korrupt Kop (No tile)
Difficulty 5
Attacks Weapon 1d8
K Korrupt Kop (No tile)
Difficulty 5
Attacks

Weapon 1d8

Base level 3
Base experience 33
Speed 10
Base AC 10
Base MR 20
Alignment 11 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 200
Size Medium
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A Kop Lieutenant:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is a human.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • wanders randomly.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference SpliceHack 1.1.0 L2562

A Korrupt Kop, K, is a type of monster that appears in SpliceHack. The Korrupt Kop is a type of Keystone Kop that has exactly the same statistics as a Kop Lieutenant, including a matching weapon attack, but can appear in circumstances outside of stealing from shops.

Generation

Korrupt Kops can be randomly generated unlike other Kops.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''Korrupt Kop''', {{cyan|K}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[SpliceHack]]. The Korrupt Kop is a type of [[Keystone Kop (monster class)|Keystone Kop]] that has exactly the same statistics as a [[Kop Lieutenant]], including a matching weapon attack, but can appear in circumstances outside of stealing from [[shop]]s.

==Generation==
Korrupt Kops can be randomly generated unlike other Kops.
